course_title: Law & Ethics in Health Care Delivery
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 30 / Seats Avail: 22Waitlist Total: 0 of 5
course_description: This course will provide in-depth examination in health law and bioethics of various instances of legal or moral tension in health care delivery. It will provide students with a theoretical foundation and practical illustrations to prepare them to engage in ethical deliberation and scholarly research related to bioethics and health law.
sections: Class Nbr: 5249, Section #: 001, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 8:45-10:15a, Instructor: I. Bedzow, Status: Open
